BetterMiniMap.TerrainOverlayDef.label: Tiberium Overlay
BetterMiniMap.TerrainOverlayDef.description: This overlay shows the distribution of tiberium on the map

BetterMiniMap.TerrainOverlayDef.label: Ships Overlay
BetterMiniMap.TerrainOverlayDef.description: This overlay shows any crashed ships that have landed on the map
